remarks: An inference rule based on the Axiom of Replacement.  Typically, ` ph ` defines a function from ` x ` to ` y ` .  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1995.)
statement:
zfrepclf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
zfrepclf.2 $e |- A e. _V $.
zfrepclf.3 $e |- ( x e. A -> E. z A. y ( ph -> y = z ) ) $.
zfrepclf $p |- E. z A. y ( y e. z <-> E. x ( x e. A /\ ph ) ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d ph z $.
$d x y z $.
